game.name: The Testament of Sherlock Holmes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Become the greatest detective of all time in The Testament of Sherlock Holmes, a twisting, turning investigation game set in a faithfully-reproduced London of 1898. As Sherlock Holmes, you must find clues, interrogate suspects and unveil a mystery in a story full of twists!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become the greatest detective of all time in The Testament of Sherlock Holmes, a twisting, turning investigation game set in a faithfully-reproduced London of 1898. As Sherlock Holmes, you must find clues, interrogate suspects and unveil a mystery in a story full of twists!

reviewHighlights.text: zzzzzzzzzzzzz 튕길 사양이 아닌데 튕김 ㅋㅋ 창모드도 하고 세이브도 하나만 햇는데 시네마틱 시작만 하면 튕김..
너무 오래 전에 플레이해서 잘 기억도 안 남..
